title: VILLAGE / ROSEMARY
description: Rosemary (previously known as Under Control) -- the member of the Union of Moribund Alcoholics who sells you booze, smokes etc.

dialogueTree.title: Rosemary: ""The legend returns. You know the d..."
dialogueTree.text: "The legend returns. You know the deal, legend-man. Smokes are smokey, pilsner... gets you drunk. You've already cleaned me out of spirits... and speed." He looks sad.

links.title: You: ""Friend? Do we know each other?""
links.text: "Friend? Do we know each other?"

links.title: Rosemary: ""Sure, friend! You know it!" He poi..."
links.text: "Sure, friend! You know it!" He points a finger-pistol at you and squeezes the trigger. "*Chck-chck*."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Yeah, Rosie was there too," the tr..."
links.text: "Yeah, Rosie was there too," the tracksuited man nods, "for your ocean-based antics. We all were. Unforgettable night."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Don't mind ol' Rosemary here, he's..."
links.text: "Don't mind ol' Rosemary here, he's a buffoon." The tracksuited man waves his hand at you. "Let's have a word after your high-concept transactions, I'll give you the lowdown."

links.title: You: ""Amphetamine?""
links.text: "Amphetamine?"

links.title: Rosemary: ""Aye, by amphetamine I mean speed.""
links.text: "Aye, by amphetamine I mean speed."

links.title: You: ""I think you didn't hear me, when I..."
links.text: "I think you didn't hear me, when I said I'm a police officer."

links.title: Rosemary: ""Sure did, buddy-boy," he taps the..."
links.text: "Sure did, buddy-boy," he taps the side of his nose. "That's why I said amphetamine. I mean speed. I mean amphetamine. I got both."

links.title: Conceptualization: "While the *grand bourgeois* in La D..."
links.text: While the *grand bourgeois* in La Delta are so rich, they literally float above the law, this merry company crawls so far beneath, they too are rendered virtually untouchable. The beauty of extremities.

links.title: You: ""I thought by speed you meant amphe..."
links.text: "I thought by speed you meant amphetamine?"

links.title: Rosemary: ""Aye, 's'what I said.""
links.text: "Aye, 's'what I said."

links.title: You: ""Right. Got it.""
links.text: "Right. Got it."

links.title: Rosemary: ""Good-good, my man." He takes a chu..."
links.text: "Good-good, my man." He takes a chug from his beer bottle. "Now what can I offer ya?"

links.title: You: ""Quite the business venture you've..."
links.text: "Quite the business venture you've set up here."

links.title: Rosemary: ""Oh..." He gets a proud gleam in hi..."
links.text: "Oh..." He gets a proud gleam in his eyes. "The system's been good to old Rosemary here and I'm milkin' 'er like a bitch goat in the backyard."

links.title: You: ""What do you mean?""
links.text: "What do you mean?"

links.title: Rosemary: ""You see, friend," he raises his in..."
links.text: "You see, friend," he raises his index finger, "man makes his own luck -- and I made mine real good. Got my hands on three bottles of *liqueur exquise*, sold two to the fellows around here and *immediately* invested the profit."

links.title: Rosemary: ""Bought cigarettes, bought beer, ev..."
links.text: "Bought cigarettes, bought beer, even bought a bit of speed. And look at me now... I got everyone on my hook." He spreads his arms and smiles a crooked toothless smile.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "The hook -- where is it? I can't se..."
links.text: The hook -- where is it? I can't see it.

links.title: You: ""I'm already hooking for Cuno... I..."
links.text: "I'm already hooking for Cuno... I think."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Seriously?" The lieutenant closes..."
links.text: "Seriously?" The lieutenant closes his eyes and pinches the root of his nose. "*Are* you?"

links.title: You: ""I'm sorry, Kim. I just wanted to s..."
links.text: "I'm sorry, Kim. I just wanted to see what happens, if I say it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Fine," he sighs."
links.text: "Fine," he sighs.

links.title: Rosemary: "The fresh entrepreneur has forgotte..."
links.text: The fresh entrepreneur has forgotten your presence and is now trying to count a small number of coins in his hand.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "There's reál, fifty in his palm."
links.text: There's reál, fifty in his palm.

links.title: Empathy: "... and the lieutenant is annoyed."
links.text: ... and the lieutenant is annoyed.

links.title: You: ""He said I'm his 'pig hooker' or so..."
links.text: "He said I'm his 'pig hooker' or something, whatever that is."

links.title: Rosemary: ""Good, good, good," he repeats, nod..."
links.text: "Good, good, good," he repeats, nodding enthusiastically. "So you want this shit or not?"

links.title: You: ""Looks like you're on your own hook..."
links.text: "Looks like you're on your own hook, too."

links.title: Rosemary: ""Of course, of course, of course......"
links.text: "Of course, of course, of course..." The drunk raises his pilsner and nods. "It is what it is, you know? What it's always been. People, buddy-boy, it's the people."

links.title: Composure: "He has long forgotten what you were..."
links.text: He has long forgotten what you were talking about.

links.title: You: ""Impressive entrepreneurship." (Poi..."
links.text: "Impressive entrepreneurship." (Point to his vice-stand.) "I approve."

links.title: Rosemary: ""Mhm -- hook 'em and cook 'em, huh?..."
links.text: "Mhm -- hook 'em and cook 'em, huh? You wanna buy something? Let's keep it moving."

links.title: You: ""Got a permit for this little shit-..."
links.text: "Got a permit for this little shit-show?"

links.title: Rosemary: ""Permit?" He's not really listening..."
links.text: "Permit?" He's not really listening. "Who gives a shit? You wanna buy something? Grease the wheels, buddy-boy."

links.title: You: ""Why does the bottle of spirits cos..."
links.text: "Why does the bottle of spirits cost 300 reál?"

links.title: Rosemary: ""See, friend..." He brings out a on..."
links.text: "See, friend..." He brings out a one-litre bottle with blue-ish liquid. The mouth is corked shut. "It's *real* valuable. Worth every reál, if you catch my drift. Got it from a bit of a business venture..."

links.title: You: "Nod -- let him speak."
links.text: Nod -- let him speak.

links.title: Rosemary: ""You know, it's funny, actually..."..."
links.text: "You know, it's funny, actually..." He bursts out laughing, then takes three gulps of his pilsner and stares at you intently.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "He's finding it difficult to focus..."
links.text: He's finding it difficult to focus his watery gaze.

links.title: You: ""What is?""
links.text: "What is?"

links.title: Rosemary: ""What?""
links.text: "What?"

links.title: Rhetoric: "Keep him talking."
links.text: Keep him talking.

links.title: You: ""What do you mean *what*? What did..."
links.text: "What do you mean *what*? What did you think was funny earlier?"

links.title: Rosemary: ""This guy, this guy..." He says and..."
links.text: "This guy, this guy..." He says and shakes his index finger at you.

links.title: Suggestion: "Conversation might bring a discount..."
links.text: Conversation might bring a discount, no?

links.title: You: ""Where did you get the bottle of sp..."
links.text: "Where did you get the bottle of spirits from?"

links.title: Rosemary: ""Oh, this is medicinal spirits. The..."
links.text: "Oh, this is medicinal spirits. The good stuff. Got it from the doctor's office."

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "He ain't shitting you. Medicinal sp..."
links.text: He ain't shitting you. Medicinal spirits are a blast, *bratan*. The flaming truth of this joke of a world.

links.title: Rosemary: ""I got one of those scientific ampo..."
links.text: "I got one of those scientific ampoules a few months ago. 'Torpedo' they call it. It's supposed to keep a man from takin' a drink." He spits a nasty yellow clot on the ground before you.

links.title: Rosemary: ""Didn't stop *me* for shit, that's..."
links.text: "Didn't stop *me* for shit, that's for sure!" His voice rings with pride. "Five lemons with half a pack of butter and you're good to go."

links.title: You: ""That's a good tip, I should rememb..."
links.text: "That's a good tip, I should remember it."

links.title: Rosemary: ""Well, it really isn't," he croaks...."
links.text: "Well, it really isn't," he croaks. "In a week the goddamned kidneys started giving me all kinds of hell. Finally the missus took me to a private doctor's office -- not a charity, the real thing..."

links.title: Rosemary: ""Those assholes!" He gets visibly a..."
links.text: "Those assholes!" He gets visibly angry. "Those assholes charged me *four reál* to remove the damn thing. But I came out on top after all!"

links.title: You: ""Assholes...""
links.text: "Assholes..."

links.title: Rosemary: ""But the idiots left me alone in th..."
links.text: "But the idiots left me alone in there. Now, I used to teach high school biology. I *know* what doctors use to preserve dead thingies..." He gets an excited gleam in his eyes.

links.title: Rosemary: ""Swiped three cans of this blue med..."
links.text: "Swiped three cans of this blue medicinal stuff from the back room. Threw the snakes out and voilà -- what's left is this beautiful blue stuff." He shakes the bottle. "98.7%, almost pure alcohol."

links.title: Logic: "Snakes or intestinal worms?"
links.text: Snakes or intestinal worms?

links.title: Rosemary: ""Two I already sold to these fine g..."
links.text: "Two I already sold to these fine gentlemen here," he nods at his companions. "But this last one is yours for three reál, if you want it?"

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Don't say it."
links.text: Don't say it.

links.title: You: ""I thought it was 300 reál.""
links.text: "I thought it was 300 reál."

links.title: Rosemary: ""Yeah! You thought right! Don't eve..."
links.text: "Yeah! You thought right! Don't even try to sneak anything past old Rosemary here." The man leans forward. "I got all senses locked on you, buddy-boy. So what will it be?"

links.title: You: ""You said it's three reál just now,..."
links.text: "You said it's three reál just now, but at first you asked three-hundred."

links.title: Rosemary: ""Aye, that's what I said just now....."
links.text: "Aye, that's what I said just now... 300 reál. Don't you try to trick me, buddy-boy". He points his finger in your general direction. "Now you want it or not?!"

links.title: Authority: "You acted with great compassion and..."
links.text: You acted with great compassion and dignity, not taking advantage of this man. Praise thine honourable heart!

links.title: You: ""Of course I do!""
links.text: "Of course I do!"

links.title: Rosemary: ""Three-hundred reál and it's yours,..."
links.text: "Three-hundred reál and it's yours, as promised." He shakes the bottle. "Best shit around!"

links.title: You: ""No, not really.""
links.text: "No, not really."

links.title: You: ""Never mind, I misheard. Three reál..."
links.text: "Never mind, I misheard. Three reál is a fair price."

links.title: Rosemary: ""Aye, the mind..." He pats his temp..."
links.text: "Aye, the mind..." He pats his temple. "...plays tricks sometimes. Always double-check. So you want it or not?"

links.title: You: ""Can I smell it first?""
links.text: "Can I smell it first?"

links.title: Rosemary: ""Here..." He uncorks the bottle and..."
links.text: "Here..." He uncorks the bottle and holds it under your nose. "Be careful, it's extremely flammable. One spark and the entire city of Revachol is wiped off the map."

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Feels like someone set a mustard fi..."
links.text: Feels like someone set a mustard field ablaze right inside your nose, then drenched it in tear gas. Your nose is a singular source of pain... but at the same time you don't remember the last time you felt so alive.

links.title: Logic: "In all fairness, that might be attr..."
links.text: In all fairness, that might be attributed to the retrograde amnesia.

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "Did I not tell you, *bratan*? This..."
links.text: Did I not tell you, *bratan*? This is it -- this is our party drink. This is what we're having, baby! Please get it for me! (The tie vibrates excitedly around your neck again.)

links.title: Rosemary: ""So, what's the deal, friend? Want..."
links.text: "So, what's the deal, friend? Want the spirits or not?"

links.title: Rosemary: ""Feels like someone's trying to jam..."
links.text: "Feels like someone's trying to jam an angry hedgehog down your nostrils, doesn't it, buddy-boy? Wait for the adrenaline-tsunami, it's *really* great!"

links.title: Endurance: "He's exaggerating. It bites, but on..."
links.text: He's exaggerating. It bites, but only a little.

links.title: You: ""I think it will prove... useful. Y..."
links.text: "I think it will prove... useful. Yes."

links.title: Rosemary: ""Three reál and it's yours, friend...."
links.text: "Three reál and it's yours, friend. The deal of a lifetime!"

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Well done. You got it."
links.text: Well done. You got it.

links.title: Logic: "That's a much more reasonable price..."
links.text: That's a much more reasonable price right there. Makes sense now.

links.title: You: ""No, not really.""
links.text: "No, not really."

links.title: You: ""Have they no shame taking money fo..."
links.text: "Have they no shame taking money for a service they provide!"

links.title: You: ""Okay, how?""
links.text: "Okay, how?"

links.title: Rosemary: ""The idiots left me alone in there...."
links.text: "The idiots left me alone in there. Now, I used to teach high school biology. I *know* what doctors use to preserve dead thingies..." He gets an excited gleam in his eyes.

links.title: You: ""That sounds dangerous.""
links.text: "That sounds dangerous."

links.title: Rosemary: ""It was," he croaks. "In a week the..."
links.text: "It was," he croaks. "In a week the goddamned kidneys started giving me all kinds of hell. Finally the missus took me to a private doctor's office -- not a charity, the real thing..."

links.title: You: ""Okay, can I just get the spirits i..."
links.text: "Okay, can I just get the spirits if that's okay with you?"

links.title: Rosemary: ""Sure-sure, the spirits!" He rubs h..."
links.text: "Sure-sure, the spirits!" He rubs his palm against the back of his head. "Now, what did I say the price was again?"

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Here's your chance."
links.text: Here's your chance.

links.title: You: ""Three-hundred reál.""
links.text: "Three-hundred reál."

links.title: Rosemary: ""Aye, that was it." He gives you a..."
links.text: "Aye, that was it." He gives you a thumbs up. "The spirits, real good stuff, you see!"

links.title: Authority: "Good man! You didn't cheat the poor..."
links.text: Good man! You didn't cheat the poor drunk out of his money. It's very *honourable* of you.

links.title: You: ""Three reál.""
links.text: "Three reál."

links.title: Rosemary: ""Oh, aye... exactly! I remember now..."
links.text: "Oh, aye... exactly! I remember now... I remember what was so funny." He waggles the blue bottle in his hand. "Three reál, that's a *real steal* for such good stuff!"

links.title: Logic: "It's almost too easy, haggling with..."
links.text: It's almost too easy, haggling with incoherent drunks.

links.title: You: ""You know what?! I don't even want..."
links.text: "You know what?! I don't even want the spirits anymore!"

links.title: Rosemary: ""So what do you want then?!""
links.text: "So what do you want then?!"

links.title: Empathy: "His tone is aggressive. You're gett..."
links.text: His tone is aggressive. You're getting on his bad side now.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "The alcohol boiling his blood cause..."
links.text: The alcohol boiling his blood causes the agitation. It burns!

links.title: You: ""Forget about it, I just want the s..."
links.text: "Forget about it, I just want the spirits!"

links.title: Rosemary: ""Ah, yes, yes... the spirits." His..."
links.text: "Ah, yes, yes... the spirits." His tone cools considerably. "That'll be 300 reál."

links.title: You: ""No one can buy spirits for 300 reá..."
links.text: "No one can buy spirits for 300 reál, that's crazy."

links.title: Rosemary: ""You know what's crazy, actually......"
links.text: "You know what's crazy, actually..." He grins, then bursts out laughing, then takes three gulps of his pilsner and stares at you intently.

links.title: You: ""I'll just have the spirits and not..."
links.text: "I'll just have the spirits and not the story today, thank you."

links.title: Rosemary: ""Right... right..." His tone cools..."
links.text: "Right... right..." His tone cools considerably. "As I said, that'll be 300 reál."

links.title: You: ""I thought about it and you know wh..."
links.text: "I thought about it and you know what? I can pay 3 reál for the spirits."

links.title: Rosemary: ""Finally came to your senses, huh,..."
links.text: "Finally came to your senses, huh, buddy-boy? Ain't nobody else gonna give you a price like that." The man starts laughing to himself. "Had to let life squeeze you to get that, huh?"

links.title: You: ""Cool. So can I get it for that?""
links.text: "Cool. So can I get it for that?"

links.title: Rosemary: ""Sure, friend. A bottle of high-qua..."
links.text: "Sure, friend. A bottle of high-quality spirits comin' right up, that'll be 3 reál and you're practically robbing me at this price."

links.title: You: ""Yes, yes. Life, squeezing, spirits..."
links.text: "Yes, yes. Life, squeezing, spirits. Let's just make a deal already."

links.title: Rosemary: ""Sure-sure, friend. People are just..."
links.text: "Sure-sure, friend. People are just so impatient these days. So, that'll be 3 reál from your pocket to mine. And at this price you're practically robbing me."

links.title: You: ""Here's the money for the spirits.""
links.text: "Here's the money for the spirits."

links.title: Rosemary: ""Whoaaa," he gasps as he hands you..."
links.text: "Whoaaa," he gasps as he hands you the bottle. "My investment hit *big bank* this time around... Look, Doom Spiral, look!"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""What?" The man in the dirty tracks..."
links.text: "What?" The man in the dirty tracksuit turns his head. "Big bank?"

links.title: Rosemary: ""The fella 'ere just gave me 300 re..."
links.text: "The fella 'ere just gave me 300 reál for a bottle of spirits! Rosemary's playin' in the big league now!"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""High-concept business venture." Th..."
links.text: "High-concept business venture." The man nods. "Solid vision, stellar execution."

links.title: You: ""Here's the money for the spirits.""
links.text: "Here's the money for the spirits."

links.title: Rosemary: "He hands you the bottle. "Jus' make..."
links.text: He hands you the bottle. "Jus' make sure to *enjoy* that one, friend!"

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "*Bratan*, I am so proud. Now -- wha..."
links.text: *Bratan*, I am so proud. Now -- whatever you do, don't drink it. This deserves so much more than just regular *oral* consumption.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "The tie is *SO* on the money there!..."
links.text: The tie is *SO* on the money there! Up the bum it goes!

links.title: You: "I don't know. Sounds like it's gonn..."
links.text: I don't know. Sounds like it's gonna turbo-boost my alcohol habit. My regular alcohol habit's gotten me enough trouble already.

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "No, no, no *bratan*! This is differ..."
links.text: No, no, no *bratan*! This is different. This is *SO GOOD* it's going to get you *out of* trouble! We're going to use it in the most *extravagant* manner!

links.title: You: "Huh..."
links.text: Huh...

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "Just step away from the old man and..."
links.text: Just step away from the old man and let's have a little word alone, just you and me. Soon we will enter the *Other-World*.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Soon. The time will come soon. Have..."
links.text: Soon. The time will come soon. Have patience, brave one.

links.title: Half Light: "I'm getting a really dark vibe from..."
links.text: I'm getting a really dark vibe from this. This... won't be pretty.

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "Just wait for my sign. Keep it with..."
links.text: Just wait for my sign. Keep it with you. Keep it warm, keep it safe. Soon we will enter the *Other-World*.

links.title: You: "But... I don't wanna put it up my b..."
links.text: But... I don't wanna put it up my bum.

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "Who said anything about putting it..."
links.text: Who said anything about putting it up there? No, we're gonna put it in a *way* more special place. Soooo special. Now just step away from the old man and let's have a little word alone, just you and me.

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "Who said anything about putting it..."
links.text: Who said anything about putting it up there? No, we're gonna put it in a *way* more special place. Soooo special. Just hang on to it, keep it safe. Wait for my sign!

links.title: You: "Okay, right. We're putting it in th..."
links.text: Okay, right. We're putting it in the bum!

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Son, you will NOT kill yourself wit..."
links.text: Son, you will NOT kill yourself with this. Not today. So we're going to store this as a SELLABLE item. Go sell it at the pawnshop for a profit.

links.title: Logic: "If you drink this, then you will di..."
links.text: If you drink this, then you will die. That's a fact. And that's why we're going to save you from yourself and store this as a SELLABLE item. Go sell it at the pawnshop for a profit.

links.title: Volition: "Harry... we're just going to store..."
links.text: Harry... we're just going to store this one as a sellable item, okay? We're not going to let you kill yourself by drinking it. That's just not an option. Sell it at the pawnshop for profit.

links.title: You: ""I want a pack of smokes.""
links.text: "I want a pack of smokes."

links.title: Rosemary: ""My kinda guy," he mumbles, handing..."
links.text: "My kinda guy," he mumbles, handing you a pack. "Here you go, friend."

links.title: You: ""Here's the money for a pilsner.""
links.text: "Here's the money for a pilsner."

links.title: Rosemary: ""Bottoms up, captain!" He hands you..."
links.text: "Bottoms up, captain!" He hands you an ugly brown bottle.

links.title: You: ""Sell me some speed.""
links.text: "Sell me some speed."

links.title: Rosemary: ""Here you go, friend." He hands you..."
links.text: "Here you go, friend." He hands you a tiny bottle with a straw. The powder looks clotted and quite mouldy.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That is unhygienic. And dangerous...."
links.text: "That is unhygienic. And dangerous. And it does not endear you to me -- just wanted to make that clear, okay?"

links.title: Rosemary: ""Pfff... unhygienic. This stuff is..."
links.text: "Pfff... unhygienic. This stuff is very hygienic. Anything else?"

links.title: You: ""I'm off." [Leave.]"
links.text: "I'm off." [Leave.]

links.title: Rosemary: ""In the civilized world, it's a cus..."
links.text: "In the civilized world, it's a custom to tip the shopkeep, friend. But come back anyway." He waves you off.

dialogueTree.title: Rosemary: ""The legend is here. You know the d..."
dialogueTree.text: "The legend is here. You know the drill. Smoke up, pilsner up... buy the beautiful bottle of blue spirits. It's..." he spreads his arms, "*magic*."

dialogueTree.title: Rosemary: ""The legend! He's back. And thirsty..."
dialogueTree.text: "The legend! He's back. And thirsty." He nods. "I got smokes and piss and a little... speed to spice things up."

dialogueTree.title: Rosemary: ""The legend returns! You know the d..."
dialogueTree.text: "The legend returns! You know the dance. Smokable smokes. Pissable pilsner -- drink it, then convert it to piss! And there's... spirits and speed too."

dialogueTree.title: Rosemary: ""Good to see you, friend! Do I have..."
dialogueTree.text: "Good to see you, friend! Do I have *deals* set up for you, buddy-boy!" He spreads his arms as if wanting to embrace you.

links.title: You: ""What are you talking about?""
links.text: "What are you talking about?"

links.title: Rosemary: ""So whadda'ya want?" He tilts his h..."
links.text: "So whadda'ya want?" He tilts his head. "I got smokes. They're cheap. Very cheap. I got pilsner. Great deal. You won't get a better deal on that piss... Spirits I can let go for 300 reál. I also have speed. And by *speed* I mean amphetamine."

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "See, there it is, bratushka! -- you..."
links.text: See, there it is, bratushka! -- you feel your necktie *strangle* you with excitement -- the *spirit*! Let's buy the spirit! 300 reál is a lot, but this has to be done.

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "It's our END GAME."
links.text: It's our END GAME.

links.title: You: "This is just another stupid drunk i..."
links.text: This is just another stupid drunk idea I'm having, that I'm attributing to my necktie.

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "Bratan, you don't understand. It's..."
links.text: Bratan, you don't understand. It's not just another drink. This is what our relationship has been building towards all these years. This is the climax. The mystery. The virginal sigh.

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "You *have* to buy it from him. Get..."
links.text: You *have* to buy it from him. Get it off him. Kill him, if you have to. Our ultimate fate depends on it. And the fate of *many worlds*.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant looks at you looking..."
links.text: The lieutenant looks at you looking at the bottle of spirits. Then at Rosemary, suspiciously.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "He knows something is going on. In..."
links.text: He knows something is going on. In your *head*.

links.title: You: "This is the mystery and the truth a..."
links.text: This is the mystery and the truth and I need to buy that spirit.

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "Exactly! This is no ordinary drink...."
links.text: Exactly! This is no ordinary drink. It's what our relationship has been building towards all these years. This is the climax. The mystery. The virginal sigh. That drink is *special*.

links.title: You: "What if I don't want to listen to m..."
links.text: What if I don't want to listen to my necktie anymore?

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "Snap out of it, bratan. This is no..."
links.text: Snap out of it, bratan. This is no time for melancholy introspection. It's time to BUY THAT SPIRIT.

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "Okay! Wow! Bratushka! -- you feel y..."
links.text: Okay! Wow! Bratushka! -- you feel your necktie *strangle* you with excitement -- the *spirit*! Let's buy the spirit! 300 reál is a lot, but this has to be done.

links.title: You: ""Good to see you too, friend.""
links.text: "Good to see you too, friend."

links.title: You: ""I'm a police officer, not your 'fr..."
links.text: "I'm a police officer, not your 'friend'."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Does he actually know you or is he..."
links.text: Does he actually know you or is he just shopkeep-friendly?
